spec_data.Name: hibernate-commons-annotations
spec_data.Description:
Following the DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself) principle,
Hibernate Validator let's you express your domain
constraints once (and only once) and ensure their
compliance at various level of your system
automatically.

Common reflection code used in support of annotation processing.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 26 Jul 2017 03:54:52 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
